alert.note: Alert for Assumption; Eastern Ascension; Iberville; Southern Livingston; St. James; St. John The Baptist; Upper Lafourche; Western Ascension (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 5:27PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern St. John The Baptist, Ascension, St. James, south central Livingston, southeastern Iberville, northwestern Lafourche and Assumption Parishes through 615 PM CDT... At 527 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sorrento, or near Donaldsonville, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gonzales, Donaldsonville, Napoleonville, Reserve, St. Gabriel, Gramercy, Lutcher, White Castle, Sorrento, French Settlement, Edgard, South Vacherie, Paincourtville, Geismar, Convent, North Vacherie, Garyville, Wallace, Supreme and Chackbay. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 174 and 198. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Assumption; Eastern Ascension; Iberville; Southern Livingston; St. James; St. John The Baptist; Upper Lafourche; Western Ascension
